1.0.name: wordpress/custom-post-type-taxonomy-archives
1.0.description: Allows for the inclusion/exclusion of custom (or standard) post types in archive pages (those archives created automatically by WordPress at /tag, /category, /author/authorname, and /year/month/day). It also adds the appropriate metaboxes for using those taxonomies with given post types.
